mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 USU.TM05SUSRNAM ,ROL.TM04SROLDES FROM TM_USUARIOSC AS USU WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TM_USUARIO_ROLESSC AS USUROL WITH (NOLOCK) ON USUROL.TM05NUSRID = USU.TM05NUSRID INNER JOIN TM_ROLSEC AS ROL WITH (NOLOCK) ON ROL.TM04NROLID = USUROL.TM04NROLID WHERE ROL.TM04SROLDES IN ('ReporteCallAgente','ReporteCallJefatura','ReporteCallGeneral') AND USU.TM05SUSRNAM = #{usuario,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
